languages.text: "Я был бы рад отправиться с тобой в преисподнюю, но, боюсь, слишком много дел удерживают меня здесь. Император защищает, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Молодой Винтерскейл слабо кивает вам.{/n} "Я был бы рад отправиться за тобой в ту преисподнюю, куда проложил маршрут твой Навигатор, но, боюсь, доставлю тебе лишь хлопоты. Император защищает, {name}".
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: "I would have liked to follow you into the fire, but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Я был бы рад отправиться с тобой в преисподнюю, но, боюсь, слишком много дел удерживают меня здесь. Император защищает, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "I would have liked to do more and follow you into the hell to which your Navigator has charted your course. But I'm afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

traits.locale_text: "I would have liked to do more and follow you into the hell to which your Navigator has charted your course. But I'm afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

traits.locale_text: "I would have liked to follow you into fire but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

traits.locale_text: "I would have liked to follow you into the fire, but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

traits.locale_text: "I would have liked to follow you into the fire, but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: “我真的很向和您一起面对所有危险，但遗憾的是，我在这里还有很多事情要忙。愿帝皇保佑您，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "I would have liked to follow you into the fire, but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “我真的很向和您一起面对所有危险，但遗憾的是，我在这里还有很多事情要忙。愿帝皇保佑您，{name}。”
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: "Ich wäre Euch gerne ins Feuer gefolgt, doch ich fürchte, mich halten zu viele Angelegenheiten hier. Der Imperator schützt uns, {name}."
languages.original_text: "I would have liked to follow you into the fire, but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wäre Euch gerne ins Feuer gefolgt, doch ich fürchte, mich halten zu viele Angelegenheiten hier. Der Imperator schützt uns, {name}."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: «Me hubiera gustado seguirle hacia la boca del lobo, pero me temo que hay demasiados asuntos que me retienen aquí. El Emperador protege, {name}».
languages.original_text: "I would have liked to follow you into the fire, but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Me hubiera gustado seguirle hacia la boca del lobo, pero me temo que hay demasiados asuntos que me retienen aquí. El Emperador protege, {name}».
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: « J'aurais aimé vous suivre dans le feu de l'action, mais je crains d'avoir bien trop d'obligations qui me contraignent à rester ici. Que l'Empereur vous protège, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "I would have liked to follow you into the fire, but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « J'aurais aimé vous suivre dans le feu de l'action, mais je crains d'avoir bien trop d'obligations qui me contraignent à rester ici. Que l'Empereur vous protège, {name}. »
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: 「あなたの後を追って火の中に入りたいのは山々ですが、残念なことに、私にはここですべきことが沢山あります。皇帝がお守りくださるでしょう、{name}」
languages.original_text: "I would have liked to follow you into the fire, but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの後を追って火の中に入りたいのは山々ですが、残念なことに、私にはここですべきことが沢山あります。皇帝がお守りくださるでしょう、{name}」
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: "Seninle birlikte ateşe yürümeyi çok isterdim ama korkarım burada kalmamı gerektiren çok iş var. İmparator korur {name}."
languages.original_text: "I would have liked to follow you into the fire, but I am afraid I have much in the way of business keeping me here. The Emperor protects, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Seninle birlikte ateşe yürümeyi çok isterdim ama korkarım ki burada kalmamı gerektiren çok iş var. İmparator korur {name}."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final
